text:
@realDonaldTrump COVID-19 Deaths as of July 11th, 2020

The USA has 137,403 COVID-19 deaths.
The WORLD has 567,734 COVID-19 deaths.

The USA has 24% of all COVID-19 deaths.
The USA has 4% of the world's population.

The numbers are heading higher. Europe now has a USA travel ban. #MAGA?
